comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 194112
Fix: using source="1.3"  for javac task in Ant

description:
Currently invoking Ant to compile under JDK 1.5 produces:

javac: target release 1.1 conflicts with default source release 1.5
summary: Can not compile using Ant scripts under JDK 1.5
